base.CHAT_WILL_BE_BANNED_MINUTES: %s , chat will be banned for %s minutes
base.CHELP: /ban [char_name] [time] - 30 minutes ban /chatoff [char_name] [time] - chat switched off for 30 minutes /rope [char_name] - drags in character within 20 metres
base.GMHELP: /ban [char_name] [time] - character banned for 30-9000 minutes. 30 minutes by default. /unban [char_name] [time] - character unbanned /chatoff [char_name] [time] - chat switched off for 30-9000 minutes. 30 minutes by default. /rope [char_name] - drags to the GM position from any place. /! [text] - send global message /resetwars [fraction name] - reset all war statuses
base.DEVHELP: /ban [char_name] [time] - character banned for 30-9000 minutes. 30 minutes by default. /unban [char_name] [time] - character unbanned /chatoff [char_name] [time] - chat switched off for 30-9000 minutes. 30 minutes by default. /rope [char_name] - drags to the GM position within any place. /system_message [text] - send global message /sysmsg /rename /myid - character ID /battlelog - battle log on/off /item [id] # - create numbered item, amount /weapon [id] [amount] - create numbered weapon, ammo /ammo [amount] [id] - create ammo /mob [id] - create numbered mutant /firstperson - first person view on/off /getquest [id] /failquest [id] /completequest [id] /wipequests /renew - reset all quests from .xml files /iwanttobeapirate # - get experience points /settime - set server time /tx [teleport point name] - teleport to /iddqd - godmode /blocknpc - block NPC dialogs /unblocknpc - unblock NPC dialogs /createclan [name] - Create new clan. Name /resetwars [fraction name] - reset all war statuses /debugEnable [radius] - mutant information enable.
base.STRING_458_8: To hire a person you need to set the base, the point number and the level
base.STRING_468_8: To fire a person you need to set the base, the point number and the level

cell.STRING_91_33: After shooting at other players you are considered as a violator, so everyone can shoot you too.
cell.STRING_92_33: PK status < 150 - PK status is permanent. Violators go to jail.
cell.KARMA_WAS_SET: The following karma value has been set: %s
